title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.8 - Legal matters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.8 - Legal matters

State Regulations

The conduct of the legal business of the Fund shall be under
the direction of the general attorney as provided by law. The general attorney
shall also be responsible for the enforcement of the subrogated rights of the

Fund against third parties and may compromise such actions in accordance with
section
29
of
the Workers' Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
450.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
